FAIR data practices

Learn to create work that is Findable, Accessible, Interoperable, and Reusable.

Reproduciblity

Create work that can be reproduced easily by others.

Open Science

Learn to share your code, data, and analysis for others to reuse.

Bridging the gap

Learn to share data results that can be utilized whether the user codes or not.

What is SHARE?

A one stop shop to perform data analysis using open science principles.
